verses.verse: My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H561>words,<s%> And <S%H6845>treasure<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H854>within<s%> you.
<S%H8104>Keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and <S%H2421>live,<s%> And my <S%H8451>teaching<s%> as the <S%H380>apple<s%> of your <S%H5869>eye.<s%>
<S%H7194>Bind<s%> them on your <S%H676>fingers;<s%> <S%H3789>Write<s%> them on the <S%H3871>tablet<s%> of your <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
<S%H559>Say<s%> to <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> "You are my <S%H269>sister,<s%>" And <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H998>understanding<s%> [your] <S%H4129>intimate<s%> <S%H4129>friend;<s%>
That they may <S%H8104>keep<s%> you from an <S%H802>adulteress,<s%> <S%H2114><s%> From the <S%H5237>foreigner<s%> who <S%H9140>flatters<s%> with her <S%H561>words.<s%>
For at the <S%H2474>window<s%> of my <S%H1004>house<s%> I <S%H8259>looked<s%> out <S%H1157>through<s%> my <S%H822>lattice,<s%>
And I <S%H7200>saw<s%> among the <S%H6612>naive,<s%> I <S%H995>discerned<s%> among the <S%H1121>youths,<s%> A <S%H5288>young<s%> <S%H5288>man<s%> <S%H2638>lacking<s%> <S%H3820>sense,<s%>
<S%H5674>Passing<s%> through the <S%H7784>street<s%> <S%H681>near<s%> her <S%H6438>corner;<s%> And he <S%H6805>takes<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> to her <S%H1004>house,<s%>
In the <S%H5399>twilight,<s%> in the <S%H6153>evening,<s%> <S%H3117><s%> In the <S%H380>middle<s%> of the <S%H3915>night<s%> and [in] the <S%H653>darkness.<s%>
And <S%H2009>behold,<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> [comes] to <S%H7122>meet<s%> him, <S%H7897>Dressed<s%> as a <S%H2181>harlot<s%> and <S%H5341>cunning<s%> of <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
She is <S%H1993>boisterous<s%> and <S%H5637>rebellious;<s%> Her <S%H7272>feet<s%> do not <S%H7931>remain<s%> at <S%H1004>home;<s%>
[She is] <S%H6471>now<s%> in the <S%H2351>streets,<s%> <S%H6471>now<s%> in the <S%H7339>squares,<s%> And <S%H693>lurks<s%> by <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6438>corner.<s%>
So she <S%H2388>seizes<s%> him and <S%H5401>kisses<s%> him, And with a <S%H5810>brazen<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%> she <S%H559>says<s%> to him:
"I was <S%H5921>due<s%> to <S%H2077>offer<s%> <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings;<s%> <S%H3117>Today<s%> I have <S%H9608>paid<s%> my <S%H5088>vows.<s%>
<S%H5921>"Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> I have <S%H3318>come<s%> out to <S%H7122>meet<s%> you, To <S%H7836>seek<s%> your <S%H6440>presence<s%> <S%H7836>earnestly,<s%> and I have <S%H4672>found<s%> you.
"I have <S%H7234>spread<s%> my <S%H6210>couch<s%> with <S%H4765>coverings,<s%> With <S%H2405>colored<s%> <S%H330>linens<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
"I have <S%H5130>sprinkled<s%> my <S%H4904>bed<s%> With <S%H4753>myrrh,<s%> <S%H174>aloes<s%> and <S%H7076>cinnamon.<s%>
<S%H1980>"Come,<s%> let us <S%H7301>drink<s%> our <S%H7301>fill<s%> of <S%H1730>love<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H1242>morning;<s%> Let us <S%H5965>delight<s%> ourselves with <S%H159>caresses.<s%>
"For the <S%H376>man<s%> is not at <S%H1004>home,<s%> He has <S%H1980>gone<s%> on a <S%H7350>long<s%> <S%H4970><s%> <S%H1870>journey;<s%>
He has <S%H3947>taken<s%> a <S%H6872>bag<s%> of <S%H3701>money<s%> with him, At <S%H3677>full<s%> <S%H3677>moon<s%> he will <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H1004>home.<s%> "
With her <S%H7230>many<s%> <S%H3948>persuasions<s%> she <S%H5186>entices<s%> him; With her <S%H9141>flattering<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%> she <S%H5080>seduces<s%> him.

<S%H6597>Suddenly<s%> he <S%H1980>follows<s%> <S%H310><s%> her, As an <S%H7794>ox<s%> <S%H935>goes<s%> to the <S%H2874>slaughter,<s%> Or as [one in] <S%H5914>fetters<s%> to the <S%H4148>discipline<s%> of a <S%H191>fool,<s%>

<S%H5704>Until<s%> an <S%H2671>arrow<s%> <S%H6398>pierces<s%> <S%H6398>through<s%> his <S%H3516>liver;<s%> As a <S%H6833>bird<s%> <S%H4116>hastens<s%> to the <S%H6341>snare,<s%> So he does not <S%H3045>know<s%> that it [will cost him] his <S%H5315>life.<s%>
<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore, [my] <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H8085>listen<s%> to me, And <S%H7181>pay<s%> <S%H7181>attention<s%> to the <S%H561>words<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
Do not let your <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H7847>turn<s%> <S%H7847>aside<s%> to her <S%H1870>ways,<s%> Do not <S%H8582>stray<s%> into her <S%H9350>paths.<s%>
For <S%H7227>many<s%> are the <S%H2491>victims<s%> she has <S%H5307>cast<s%> <S%H5307>down,<s%> And <S%H6099>numerous<s%> are <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H2026>slain.<s%>
Her <S%H1004>house<s%> is the <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol,<s%> <S%H3381>Descending<s%> to the <S%H2315>chambers<s%> of <S%H4194>death.<s%>
